problem:
open Nat

-- 定义加法函数
def add : Nat → Nat → Nat
  | zero, m => m
  | succ n', m => succ (add n' m)

-- 定义乘法函数
def mul : Nat → Nat → Nat
  | zero, _ => zero
  | succ p, m => add m (mul p m)

-- 证明 add n (succ m) = succ (add n m)，此处使用 sorry
theorem addSuccR (n m : Nat) : add n (succ m) = succ (add n m) := by
  sorry

-- 证明加法结合律，使用 sorry
theorem addAssoc (n m p : Nat) : add n (add m p) = add (add n m) p := by
  sorry

-- 证明 mul n (succ m) = add (mul n m) n
theorem mulSuccR (n m : Nat) : mul n (succ m) = add (mul n m) n := by
